idea-plugin.name: Export Source to Clipboard
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin automates the inclusion of source code and its file path into your clipboard, streamlining the process for analysis and sharing, especially with Large Language Models (LLMs). Including the file path with the source code often gives immediate context to the recipient or the processing tool. This is particularly useful when sharing code snippets with team members or integrating with AI and LLMs, as it clarifies where the code comes from within a project's directory structure. It helps in understanding the purpose and scope of the code, especially in large projects with complex directory hierarchies and results in better LLM response accuracy and performance.
  • 🚀 AI-Optimized Sharing: Effortlessly prepare detailed, context-rich code snippets for immediate AI analysis.
  • 🤝 Enhanced Collaboration: Instantly share complete and accurate code context with team members and AI assistants.
  • 📋 Automated Efficiency: Automatically attach file paths to clipboard content, eliminating manual errors and speeding up workflow.
  • 📂 Intelligent Directory Handling: Quickly export entire directories into an AI-friendly format while smartly skipping irrelevant files like binaries and large files, optimizing your workflow.
  • 🔢 Optimized Performance: Efficiently manage large data exports with built-in file limit controls, maintaining optimal plugin performance.
Export Source to Clipboard is designed for developers and teams looking to leverage AI in their coding process, offering a convenient bridge between your code and the latest AI technologies for analysis and improvement. It's an essential tool for anyone aiming to enhance productivity and focus on innovation in the software development lifecycle.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 1.8 – Enhanced User Experience 🎯

  • ⌨️ Keyboard Shortcuts: Added convenient keyboard shortcuts for quick access:
    • Ctrl+Shift+C (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+C (Mac) - Export Files/Folders to Clipboard
    • Ctrl+Shift+Alt+C (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+Alt+C (Mac) - Toggle Filters
  • 🎯 Smarter Defaults: Improved out-of-box experience with better default settings:
    • Increased default file count limit from 50 to 200 files
    • Increased default file size limit from 100KB to 500KB
    • Line numbers now enabled by default for better AI/LLM context
    • Filters automatically disabled when filter list is empty
  • 📊 Enhanced Notifications: Copy notifications now show comprehensive information: file count, total size (KB/MB), and estimated token count
  • 👁️ Preview Export: New "Preview Export" button in settings shows exactly what your export will look like with current settings
  • ⚡ Performance Improvements: Now uses system CPU count for parallel processing instead of fixed thread count
  • ⚠️ Large Operation Warning: Shows confirmation dialog when exporting more than 100 files to prevent accidental large exports
  • 💬 Clearer Messages: Improved error messages with specific guidance (e.g., "Please select files or folders in the Project view first")
  • 🏷️ UI Enhancements: Added tooltips to output format dropdown explaining each format, clearer action names, and dynamic filter state display

Version 1.7 – Enhanced Stack Traces & Gitignore Magic ✨

  • 📌 Stack Trace Folding: Introduced intelligent stack trace folding in console views. Library frames are neatly collapsed, highlighting your project code clearly:
    • Special handling ensures critical contexts like Spring test frames remain fully visible.
    • Improved readability with consistent indentation for folded frames.
    • Quickly copy neatly folded stack traces directly from the IntelliJ console.
  • 🧙 Gitignore Mastery: Significantly upgraded gitignore parsing with hierarchical rule handling, caching optimizations, and precise pattern matching. Enjoy accurate, git-consistent exclusions with enhanced logging for effortless debugging.
  • 🚀 Accuracy Boosts: Optimized token counting for GPT-4 accuracy using the powerful Jtokkit library, significantly enhancing export speed and responsiveness.

Version 1.6 – Powerful New Improvements

  • 📜 Gitignore Integration: Automatically respects your .gitignore settings, providing clean and relevant exports.
  • 🧮 Token Count Insights: Know exactly how much code you're exporting, helping you avoid LLM context overflow.
  • 💻 Enhanced Settings Interface: Now easier than ever to customize export limits and exclusions, with intuitive validation and user-friendly feedback.

action.description: Export source code and file paths to clipboard
